data.Text: I'm currently building product and partnerships at [skiff], a privacy-first, decentralized workspace. Recently, I wrapped my degrees at Berkeley's [met] program.

Previously, I tinkered with equities trading and compilers at [js], shipped [branching] at [figma], and moved (fiat) money through the internet at [stripe]. I engaged in protocol politicking as part of [bab] and contributed to the development of projects like [osmosis].
I enjoy David Gilmour [solos], groovy house sets, L-theanine based drinks, oyster bars, [hk], and exploring the [frontiers] of immersive art.
Thanks for stopping by â€” reach out if anything caught your eye.
